name: Resource Allocation Using Blockchain
summary: Smart contracts (Campaign, CampaignFactory) with donor-majority approvals, safeguarded fund flows, and IPFS-backed immutable metadata.
highlights: Deployed on Polygon Amoy with Hardhat; enforced donor-majority approvals.
Integrated IPFS for content-addressed media and metadata.
Used PoS finality with SHA-256 and Keccak-256 hashing for integrity.

name: Autonomous Line Follower Robot
summary: 2WD autonomous robot with optimized PWM (7812.5 Hz) for stable low-speed control and precise line tracking.
highlights: Calibrated IR sensing for stable following.
Optimized PWM frequency for smooth motion.
